title: Amio
description:
Amio helps you create AI-powered chatbots for e-shops that automate 95% of customer queries.

Amio's chatbot can answer any after-sales question and help with shopping by recommending the right products. By detecting customers in need of an assistant and proactively starting a conversation with them, your e-commerce store can increase conversion by over 20%.

Amio uses e-shop product feeds to keep up-to-date information on stock, price, and new products.
